channel.title: Webclients and Jre 8
channel.description:
Okay so now that JRE 8 is all fucking nazi with security how can I go about making my webclient work http://prntscr.com/55gceg
Google chrome keeps saying I don't have a jre 8 plug in but i have jre 8... (simple solution don't use chrome) yes i know but alot of people love google for some odd reason and i've been begged by 20 players to fix this so here i am...
REAL QUESTION: How to make my web client not need players to go to java c.p and add the website acception

item.title: Webclients and Jre 8

item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Java is probably disabled in your browsers settings.
